scripts.coverage: BABEL_ENV=COVERAGE COVERAGE=1 COVERAGE_VERBOSE=1 COVERAGE_OUT_JSON=1 COVERAGE_OUT_TEXT_SUMMARY=1 COVERAGE_APP_FOLDER=/$PWD/ npm run test && nyc report --reporter html --reporter text -t .coverage --report-dir .coverage/summary --check-coverage --statements 100 --functions 100 --lines 100 --branches 100
scripts.test:watch: MOCHA_TIMEOUT=30000 WHEN_USING_OLD_API=1 BROWSERSLIST_IGNORE_OLD_DATA=1 NODE_OPTIONS='--trace-warnings' ROOT_URL='' MONGO_URL='' NO_HMR=1 meteor test --port=4040 --driver-package meteortesting:mocha
scripts.test:e2e: SCREENSHOT_DIR=$PWD ROOT_URL='' MONGO_URL='' HEADLESS=1 NO_HMR=1 TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=puppeteer meteor test --port=4040 --once --full-app --driver-package universe:e2e --raw-logs
scripts.test:e2e:watch: SCREENSHOT_DIR=$PWD ROOT_URL='' MONGO_URL='' HEADLESS=0 NO_HMR=1 TEST_BROWSER_DRIVER=puppeteer meteor test --port=4040 --full-app --driver-package universe:e2e --raw-logs
